hasDitaContent.@value: Doxycycline increases the anticoagulant effect of acenocoumarol. Manufacturer advises monitor INR.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Doxycycline   increases   the anticoagulant effect of   acenocoumarol .  Manufacturer advises monitor INR .

hasDitaContent.@value: Acitretin increases the risk of benign intracranial hypertension when given with doxycycline. Manufacturer advises avoid.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Acitretin   increases   the risk of benign intracranial hypertension when given with   doxycycline .  Manufacturer advises avoid .

hasDitaContent.@value: Both doxycycline and alcohol can increase the risk of hepatotoxicity.

hasDitaContent.@value: Oral antacids greatly decrease the absorption of oral doxycycline. Manufacturer advises separate administration by 2 to 3 hours.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Oral   antacids   greatly   decrease   the absorption of   oral   doxycycline .  Manufacturer advises separate administration by 2 to 3 hours .
